title: ICC Fire Service Membership Council Meeting - September 14, 2022

media:group.media:description:
Monthly meeting of the ICC Fire Service Membership Council Governing Committee.

Visit the ICC Fire Service Membership Council at:
Web: www.iccsafe.org/fsmc
Twitter: https://twitter.com/ICC_Fireâ€‹ or @ICC_Fire

[00:02:07]
1. Call to Order/Roll Call/Welcome guests and new members (Reed)

[00:09:46]
